name: oldTail
description: Collect shiny herbs. Seven maps! Seven herbs! Seven ways! Find and track clues.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 (32 or 64bit) Processor: 3.0ghz Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: shader version 3.0 capable video card, 1GB video card memory, (Ati Radeon HD 5770, Nvidia GeForce GT 730) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 (32 or 64bit) Processor: 3.50ghz Intel Core i7 or Higher Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760, Radeon HD 7870 (2GB video card memory) DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 10 GB available space
